message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe you'll find it to be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to start with a price of $18000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm still not willing to go below $17000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I think $16500 is the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $16000, but I'm not going any lower than that.
I'm starting to think we're not that close to a deal after all. I'm willing to pay $14500 for the product. Can you consider that?

I'm not willing to go below $17000, but I'm willing to meet you at $16500, and I'll throw in some additional value to sweeten the deal. I'll include a premium service package worth $1000. This is my final offer.
